headline: HAS Deadline: HAS Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K Have Opportunity to Lead Hasbro, Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Rosen Law Firm, a global investor rights law firm, reminds purchasers of common stock of Hasbro, Inc. between February 7, 2022 and October 25, 2023, both dates...

headline: Hasbro, Inc. (HAS) Investors Who Lost Money Have Opportunity to Lead Securities Fraud Lawsuit
summary: LOS ANGELES, Jan. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Glancy Prongay & Murray LLP announces that investors with losses have opportunity to lead the securities fraud class action lawsuit against Hasbro, Inc. . ...

headline: Three Reasons Why HAS is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Hasbro has been treading water for the past six months, recording a small return of 1.2% while holding steady at $57.50. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 7% gain during that period.
